Description: Solid-cast small figure in copper alloy; depicting a figure (male?) reclining on a bier or coffin; very crude design; details of figure very worn off; corroded.
Curator's comments: This bronze is unique in the corpus of Naukratis (drawing published in Petrie 1886, pl. XX, no. 2). Petrie, W. M. F. 1886, Naukratis. Part I., 1884-5 (Third Memoir of the Egypt Exploration Fund), London.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XX, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (MB.193) (phase 3)
